description: From the smallest cells to the largest ecosystems, explore the science of living things. This course covers the core concepts of modern biology in an engaging, interactive format.

lessons.title: Foundations of Life
lessons.description: Biology basics, properties of water, and the four macromolecules

lessons.title: The Cell
lessons.description: Cell theory, prokaryotic vs eukaryotic cells, and organelles

lessons.title: Genetics and Heredity
lessons.description: DNA structure, Mendelian genetics, and inheritance patterns

lessons.title: Evolution
lessons.description: Natural selection, evidence for evolution, and speciation

lessons.title: Organisms and Ecology
lessons.description: Ecosystems, food webs, biomes, and environmental interactions

lessons.title: Human Body Systems
lessons.description: Major organ systems and how they maintain homeostasis
